text.section: This section applies to a motor carrier providing transportation for hire by or through contract with a public authority, or a federal, State, district, or municipal transportation agency.

A motor carrier subject to this section:
is also subject to §§ 5-101 and 5-304 of this article; and
except as provided in § 9-201(b)(7) of this subtitle, shall obtain a motor carrier permit under § 9-201 of this subtitle.

A motor carrier permit issued to a motor carrier subject to this section may be:
subject to conditions under § 9-203 of this subtitle; and
suspended, revoked, or subsequently denied under § 9-204 of this subtitle.
Except as provided in this section, the provisions of this division do not apply to a motor carrier subject to this section.
